## Rmarkdown activity  
![](https://youtu.be/PvfFr-eY77E){width="90%"}  
  
Data science projects in R can use a special data file type called an Rmarkdown (Rmd) file. To learn more about this file type and how to use it in Rstudio,  
  
1. Create a new project in Rstudio  
2. Download the [rmarkdown activity file](www/objects/1-rmarkdown_activity_file.Rmd)  
3. Move it to an Rstudio project directory  
4. Open the file and follow the instructions
5. If you get stuck at anytime, unpause the video above for a walkthrough
